docs.title: The UEL is a programming language.
docs.text:
The UEL programming language is interpreted language, and dynamic language. It's very simple.

Let's to learning Glossary and UEL

  1. Glossary
  2. Tutorial

docs.title: The UEL miscellaneous.
docs.text: There are two kind of the misc

docs.title: 2. Testing
docs.text: If you want to test feature or bug. You're must be test

    • Installation UEL with python-pip

  • Getting started

docs.title: The commands of UEL CLI.
docs.text:
There're many commands of uel. Let's learn it.

For example. 

uel run <filename>

docs.title: The all of commands.
docs.text:
This is UEL's commands. This is very simple.

Command name Information run execute UEL source code file.

docs.title: Installation
docs.text:
If you are a user, It's very simple. use the pip 

pip install uel
If you are a Chinese. Maybe will fail. please use Chinese mirror-sources. For example 
pip install uel -i

docs.title: Bugfix
docs.text: 1. The variable left must be has " ". in now it's optional

Remove the server.

Because this is a bad update, the next release is coming soon.

docs.title: What's new in 0.4.13
docs.text:
1. ISSUE_TEMPLATE The ISSUE_TEMPLATE is a good idea. It's good for user to do issue
  2. Code review for bytecode compiler
  3. Fix bugs

docs.title: The 0.5.x updates core
docs.text: The 0.5.x is about documentations. Because there were fewer documents and fewer updates before.

docs.title: What's about 0.6.x?
docs.text:
Found 102 errors in 17 files (checked 1 source file)
Fix the bugs

Version Number of bugs 0.6.0 100 0.6.1 90 0.6.2 80 0.6.3 0

There are many things in 1.5.0. It's a good upgrade. Welcome you to learn about 1.5.0!

docs.title: Developer's Word
docs.text: There are many things is abandon. Because the "brainfuck" is a small test for unittest. And don't know which format code tool to choose. The "imports flush" is superfluous.
